USDYDeployed(address,address,address,str.details: Event emitted when upgradable USDY is deployed

params.implementation: The address for the implementation contract
params.proxy: The address for the proxy contract
params.proxyAdmin: The address for the proxy admin contract

deployUSDY(string,string,(address,addres.details: This function will deploy an upgradable instance of USDY

params.name: The name of the token we want to deploy.
params.ticker: The ticker for the token we want to deploy.

returns._0: address The address of the proxy contract.
returns._1: address The address of the proxyAdmin contract.
returns._2: address The address of the implementation contract.

multiexcall((address,bytes,uint256)[]).details: All external calls made through this function will      msg.sender == contract address

params.exCallData: Struct consisting of       1) target - contract to call       2) data - data to call target with       3) value - eth value to call target with

deployUSDY(string,string,(address,addres.notice: 1) Will automatically revoke all deployer roles granted to            address(this).         2) Will grant DEFAULT_ADMIN & PAUSER_ROLE(S) to `guardian`            address specified in constructor.         3) Will transfer ownership of the proxyAdmin to guardian            address.

userdoc.notice: This contract serves as a Factory for the upgradable USDY token contract.         Upon calling `deployUSDY` the `guardian` address (set in constructor) will         deploy the following:         1) USDY - The implementation contract, ERC20 contract with the initializer disabled         2) ProxyAdmin - OZ ProxyAdmin contract, used to upgrade the proxy instance.Owner is set to `guardian` address.         3) TransparentUpgradeableProxy - OZ, proxy contract. Admin is set to `address(proxyAdmin)`.                                          `_logic' is set to `address(cash)`.         Following the above mentioned deployment, the address of the CashFactory contract will:         i) Grant the `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` & PAUSER_ROLE to the `guardian` address         ii) Revoke the `MINTER_ROLE`, `PAUSER_ROLE` & `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` from address(this).         iii) Transfer ownership of the ProxyAdmin to that of the `guardian` address.`guardian` address in constructor is a msig.
